name: Lazy Zone
description:
Welcome to the lazy zone! Here you will battle fearsome enemies such as snails, bees and frogs.

Default keyboard controls are:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to fire/run
  • X to jump
  • Enter to pause, confirm menus

Gamepad also supported but might have to be configured in the game options to work.

There was no time to add music. Might come later. Also quite a lot of polish missing. ONLY TESTED IN CHROME!!

Bugs:

  • Moving platforms sometimes behave strangely
  • Sometimes main characters will start to jitter when landing on a platform
